description.component: Call out specific text from the content. These are intended to draw priority attention to that text.

type.name: Callout type
type.description: Bootstrap includes several predefined callout type styles.

callout_utility_classes.name: Utility Classes
callout_utility_classes.description: An array of utility classes that can be used to add extra Bootstrap utility classes or custom classes to this component.

attributes.name: Attributes
attributes.description: HTML attributes for the callout element.

args.content: Default callout. Example text to show it in action.
